data.text: Let's start with the first four words: in the West Village. 'In the' was very quick.

translation.text: Hãy bắt đầu với bốn từ đầu tiên: ở West Village. 'Trong' rất nhanh.

data.text: In the [6x]. 'West' and 'Village' both had more time. West, Village. In the West Village.

translation.text: Trong [6x]. "Tây" và "Làng" đều có nhiều thời gian hơn. Tây, Làng. Ở làng Tây.

data.text: So even though 'in the' is two words, it was probably faster than the single word 'West'.

translation.text: Vì vậy, mặc dù 'trong' là hai từ, nó có thể nhanh hơn từ đơn 'Tây'.

data.text: In the West, in the West Village.

translation.text: Ở miền Tây, ở làng Tây.

data.text: >> In the West Village. [3x]

translation.text: >> Ở làng Tây. [3x]

translation.text: >> ... cho pizza. [3x] >> Ở làng Tây cho pizza.

data.text: >> We may stay in the West Village afterwards [3x]

translation.text: >> Chúng tôi có thể ở lại West Village sau đó [3x]

data.text: word, which will usually be stressed in a sentence. Again 'in the' was very quick. 'West'

data.text: to. Again, a reduction I did not do. The word 'to' usually has the schwa sound in it. And

data.text: I hope this has given you some ideas on how to take notes and study the speech of native

data.text: speakers. Do this on your own. Take video and audio clips that interest you, or that

title: Pronunciation Study Exercise: Evening Plans - American English
